nappo.core.models package¶

Submodules¶

nappo.core.models.actor_critic module¶

class nappo.core.models.actor_critic.OffPolicyActorCritic(input_space, action_space, feature_extractor_network=<class 'nappo.core.models.neural_networks.MLP'>, feature_extractor_kwargs={}, recurrent_policy=False, recurrent_hidden_size=512, create_double_q_critic=True)¶

Bases: torch.nn.modules.module.Module

Actor critic class for Off-Policy algorithms.

It contains a policy network (actor) to predict next actions and one or two Q networks.

input_spacegym.Space

Environment observation space.

action_spacegym.Space

Environment action space.

feature_extractor_networknn.Module

PyTorch nn.Module to extract features in all networks.

feature_extractor_kwargsdict

Keyword arguments for the feature extractor network.

recurrent_policybool

Whether to use a RNN as a policy.

recurrent_hidden_sizeint

Policy RNN hidden size.

create_double_q_criticbool

Whether to instantiate a second Q network or not.

policy_netnn.module

Neural network that extracts features from the input env obs.

input_spacegym.Space

Environment observation space.

action_spacegym.Space

Environment action space.

distnn.module

Neural network that predict a prob distribution over the action space

q1nn.module

Neural network that predicts a Q-value for a given env obs and action.

q2nn.module

A second neural network to predict a Q-value for a given env obs and action.

scalenn.module

Maps actions from [space.low, space.high] range to [-1, 1] range.

unscalenn.module

Maps actions from [-1, 1] range to [space.low, space.high] range.

classmethod actor_critic_factory(input_space, action_space, restart_model=None, recurrent_policy=False, recurrent_hidden_size=512, feature_extractor_kwargs={}, feature_extractor_network=<class 'nappo.core.models.neural_networks.MLP'>, create_double_q_critic=True)¶

Returns a function that creates actor critic instances.

input_spacegym.Space

Environment observation space.

action_spacegym.Space

Environment action space.

restart_modelstr

Path to a previously trained ActorCritic checkpoint to be loaded.

feature_extractor_networknn.Module

PyTorch nn.Module used as the features extraction block in all networks.

feature_extractor_kwargsdict

Keyword arguments for the feature extractor network.

recurrent_policybool

Whether to use a RNN as a policy.

recurrent_hidden_sizeint

Policy RNN hidden size.

create_double_q_criticbool

whether to instantiate a second Q network or not.

create_actor_critic_instancefunc

creates a new OffPolicyActorCritic class instance.

get_action(obs, rhs, dones, deterministic=False)¶

Predict and return next action, along with other information.

obstorch.tensor

Current environment observation.

rhstorch.tensor

Current recurrent hidden state.

donetorch.tensor

Current done tensor, indicating if episode has finished.

deterministicbool

Whether to randomly sample action from predicted distribution or take the mode.

actiontorch.tensor

Next action sampled.

clipped_actiontorch.tensor

Next action sampled, but clipped to be within the env action space.

logp_actiontorch.tensor

Log probability of action within the predicted action distribution.

rhstorch.tensor

Updated recurrent hidden state.

entropy_disttorch.tensor

Entropy of the predicted action distribution.

get_q_scores(obs, actions=None)¶

Return Q scores of the given observations and actions. Parameters ———- obs : torch.tensor

Environment observation.

actionstorch.tensor

Evaluated actions.

q1torch.tensor

Q score according to current q1 network version.

q2torch.tensor

Q score according to current q2 network version.

property is_recurrent¶

Returns True if the policy network has recurrency.

policy_initial_states(obs)¶

Returns all policy inputs to predict the environment initial action.

obstorch.tensor

Initial environment observation.

obstorch.tensor

Initial environment observation.

rhstorch.tensor

Initial recurrent hidden state (will contain zeroes).

donetorch.tensor

Initial done tensor, indicating the environment is not done.

property recurrent_hidden_state_size¶

Size of policy recurrent hidden state

class nappo.core.models.actor_critic.OnPolicyActorCritic(input_space, action_space, feature_extractor_network=<class 'nappo.core.models.neural_networks.MLP'>, feature_extractor_kwargs={}, recurrent_policy=False, recurrent_hidden_size=512, shared_policy_value_network=True)¶

Bases: torch.nn.modules.module.Module

Actor critic class for On-Policy algorithms.

It contains a policy network (actor) to predict next actions and a critic value network to predict the value score of a given obs.

input_spacegym.Space

Environment observation space.

action_spacegym.Space

Environment action space.

feature_extractor_networknn.Module

PyTorch nn.Module used as the features extraction block in all networks.

feature_extractor_kwargsdict

Keyword arguments for the feature extractor network.

recurrent_policybool

Whether to use a RNN as a policy.

recurrent_hidden_sizeint

Policy RNN hidden size.

shared_policy_value_networkbool

Whether or not to share weights between policy and value networks.

policy_netnn.module

Neural network that extracts features from the input env obs.

input_spacegym.Space

Environment observation space.

action_spacegym.Space

Environment action space.

distnn.module

Neural network that predict a prob distribution over the action space from the features extracted by the policy_net.

value_netnn.module

Neural network that predicts a value score for a given env obs.

shared_policy_value_networkbool

If True, the feature extraction block of the value_net will be the policy_net.

scalenn.module

Maps actions from [space.low, space.high] range to [-1, 1] range.

unscalenn.module

Maps actions from [-1, 1] range to [space.low, space.high] range.

classmethod actor_critic_factory(input_space, action_space, restart_model=None, recurrent_policy=False, recurrent_hidden_size=512, feature_extractor_kwargs={}, shared_policy_value_network=False, feature_extractor_network=<class 'nappo.core.models.neural_networks.MLP'>)¶

Returns a function that creates actor critic instances.

input_spacegym.Space

action_spacegym.Space

Environment action space.

Keyword arguments for the feature extractor network.

recurrent_policybool

Whether to use a RNN as a policy.

recurrent_hidden_sizeint

Policy RNN hidden size.

shared_policy_value_networkbool

Whether or not to share weights between policy and value networks.

create_actor_critic_instancefunc

creates a new OnPolicyActorCritic class instance.

evaluate_actions(obs, rhs, done, action)¶

Evaluate log likelihood of action given obs and the current policy network. Returns also value prediction and entropy distribution.

obstorch.tensor

Environment observation.

rhstorch.tensor

Recurrent hidden state.

donetorch.tensor

Done tensor, indicating if episode has finished.

actiontorch.tensor

Evaluated action.

valuetorch.tensor

Value score according to current value_net version.

logp_actiontorch.tensor

Log probability of action according to the action distribution predicted with current version of the policy_net.

entropy_disttorch.tensor

Entropy of the action distribution predicted with current version of the policy_net.

rhstorch.tensor

Updated recurrent hidden state.

rhstorch.tensor

Whether to randomly sample action from predicted distribution or take the mode.

actiontorch.tensor

Next action sampled.

clipped_actiontorch.tensor

Next action sampled, but clipped to be within the env action space.

Log probability of action within the predicted action distribution.

Entropy of the predicted action distribution.

nappo.core.models.distributions module¶

class nappo.core.models.distributions.Categorical(num_inputs, num_outputs)¶

Bases: torch.nn.modules.module.Module

Categorical action distribution.

num_inputsint

Size of input feature maps.

num_outputsint

Number of action in action space.

linear: nn.Module

Maps the incoming feature maps to probabilities over actions in output space.

evaluate_actions(x, action)¶

Return log prob of action under the distribution generated from x (obs features). Also return entropy of the generated distribution.

xtorch.tensor

obs feature map obtained from a policy_net.

actiontorch.tensor

Evaluated action.

logp_actiontorch.tensor

Log probability of action according to the action distribution predicted.

entropy_disttorch.tensor

Entropy of the action distribution predicted.

forward(x, deterministic=False)¶

Predict distribution parameters from x (obs features) and return actions (sampled and clipped), sampled action log probability and distribution entropy.

xtorch.tensor

Feature maps extracted from environment observations.

deterministicbool

Whether to randomly sample action from predicted distribution or take the mode.

action: torch.tensor

Predicted next action.

clipped_action: torch.tensor

Predicted next action (clipped to be within action space).

logp_actiontorch.tensor

Log probability of action according to the predicted action distribution.

entropy_disttorch.tensor

Entropy of the predicted action distribution.

class nappo.core.models.distributions.DiagGaussian(num_inputs, num_outputs, predict_log_std=False)¶

Bases: torch.nn.modules.module.Module

Gaussian action distribution.

num_inputsint

Size of input feature maps.

num_outputsint

Number of action in action space.

predict_log_stdbool

Whether to use a nn.linerar layer to predict the output actions std.

mean: nn.Module

Maps the incoming feature maps to output action mean values.

log_stdnn.Module or nn.Parameter

If predict_log_std is True Maps the incoming feature maps to output action std values. Otherwise, the std values are a learnable nn.Parameter.

LOG_STD_MAXfloat

Maximum std allowed value. Used for clipping.

LOG_STD_MINfloat

Minimum std allowed value. Used for clipping.

LOG_STD_MAX = 2¶
LOG_STD_MIN = -20¶
evaluate_actions(x, action)¶

Return log prob of action under the distribution generated from x (obs features). Also return entropy of the generated distribution.

obs feature map obtained from a policy_net.

actiontorch.tensor

Evaluated action.

logp_actiontorch.tensor

Log probability of action according to the action distribution predicted.

entropy_disttorch.tensor

Entropy of the action distribution predicted.

Predict distribution parameters from x (obs features) and return actions (sampled and clipped), sampled action log probability and distribution entropy.

Feature maps extracted from environment observations.

Whether to randomly sample action from predicted distribution or take the mode.

class nappo.core.models.distributions.SquashedGaussian(num_inputs, num_outputs, predict_log_std=True)¶

Bases: torch.nn.modules.module.Module

Squashed Gaussian action distribution.

num_inputsint

Size of input feature maps.

num_outputsint

Number of action in action space.

predict_log_stdbool

Whether to use a nn.linerar layer to predict the output actions std.

mean: nn.Module

Maps the incoming feature maps to output action mean values.

log_stdnn.Module or nn.Parameter

If predict_log_std is True Maps the incoming feature maps to output action std values. Otherwise, the std values are a learnable nn.Parameter.

LOG_STD_MAXfloat

Maximum std allowed value. Used for clipping.

LOG_STD_MINfloat

Minimum std allowed value. Used for clipping.

LOG_STD_MAX = 2¶
LOG_STD_MIN = -20¶

Predict distribution parameters from x (obs features) and return actions (detemrninistic, sampled and clipped), sampled action log probability and distribution entropy.

class nappo.core.models.neural_networks.NNBase(input_shapes, feature_extractor, feature_extractor_kwargs, recurrent=False, output_shape=(256, ), recurrent_hidden_size=512, activation=<class 'torch.nn.modules.activation.ReLU'>, final_activation=False)¶

Bases: torch.nn.modules.module.Module

Base Neural Network class.

input_shapeslist of tuples

List of all input shapes.

output_shapetuple

Shape of output feature map.

feature_extractornn.Module

PyTorch nn.Module used as the features extraction block.

feature_extractor_kwargsdict

Keyword arguments for the feature extractor network.

recurrentbool

Whether to use recurrency or not.

recurrent_input_size (int):

Input size of GRU layer.

recurrent_hidden_size (int):

Hidden size of GRU layer.

activationfunc

Non-linear activation function.

final_activationbool

Whether or not to apply nonlinearity after last layer.

is_recurrentbool

True if this is a recurrent neural network.

num_outputsint

Output feature map size (as in np.prod(self.output_shape)).

output_shapetuple

Output feature map shape.

recurrent_hidden_state_sizeint

Recurrent hidden state size

feature_extractornn.Module

Neural network feature extractor block.

grunn.Module

Neural network recurrency block.

outputnn.Module

Neural network final layer.

forward(inputs, hxs=None, done=None)¶

Forward pass Neural Network

inputstorch.tensor or tuple

Input data, containing obs or obs + action.

hxstorch.tensor

Current recurrent hidden state.

donetorch.tensor

Current done tensor, indicating if episode has finished.

outtorch.tensor

Output feature map.

hxstorch.tensor

Updated recurrent hidden state.
